entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-01-14
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Statically linked cloud native executables and static linking of OpenSSL #80654
  • [API Proposal]: Add T PickRandomly(IReadOnlyList<T> source) #80651
  • Duplicate definition of PaddingFor32 with different cache line size on x86_64 #80650
  • zsh comes up on macOS even though System.Diagnostics.ProcessStartInfo.CreateNoWindow is specified as true. #80649
  • System.Diagnostics.Process.StandardInput.WriteLine does not work properly on macOS. #80648
  • One about foreach and type access #80647
  • Various non-control characters are interpreted as control characters by the console. #80644

Closed

  • JIT: Assertion failed '!"Missing flags on tree"' during 'Assertion prop' for recently added RuntimeHelpers.CreateSpan uses #80632
    8.0.0
  • Alpine 3.17 images causes SSL Error "unsafe legacy renegotiation disabled" #80641
  • Static constructor on an interface is not invoked #80538

PullRequests

Created

  • Handle float/double for RVA[cns] optimization in fgValueNumberConstLoad #80661
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [wasm] debugger tests- Misc improvements #80660
    arch-wasm, test-enhancement, area-Debugger-mono
  • JIT: Fix implicit byref block expansion #80659
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [wasm][debugger]Disable test which is getting stuck #80658
    area-Debugger-mono
  • [wasm] Quote illink substitutions path #80657
    area-Build-mono
  • [mono][wasm] Avoid emitting the eh info table, its not used on wasm. #80653
    area-Codegen-AOT-mono
  • Fix indexing of correlated diagnostic binaries #80652
  • Switch to using the .NET SDK properties that are defined to provide the TFM instead of using the assembly that defines System.Object #80646
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, tenet-performance, source-generator
  • Be more conservative with peephole optimization #80645
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Remove duplicate function #80643
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Fix nested non-byref like VC with no pointer fields #80642
    area-TypeSystem-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • Avoid using a null heap to decommit the mark array #80640
    area-GC-coreclr
  • [wasm] Change TrimMode setting for templates, and tests #80639
    area-Build-mono

Merged

  • Add support for llvm linker (lld) #80613
    community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Fix GC hole in newly added test #80630
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, test-bug, 8.0.0
  • [wasm] Remove forward slash in trimmer args #80631
    area-Build-mono
  • Set FieldSeq in CreateSpan for field handle #80622
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Allow eliminating virtual methods on abstract classes #80607
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Add additional IG assertion checking #80599
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [PERF] Fix errors from lowercase OS names #80629
    area-Infrastructure, area-Infrastructure-mono, perf-pipeline

Updated

  • [wasm] Enable dedup by default. #80260
    area-Build-mono
  • NativeAOT: avoid helper calls for static fields #79709
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Initial work to port EventPipe library to NativeAOT #80382
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Fix some low-hanging HWIntrinsic issues #80626
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • WIP - NativeAOT for FreeBSD #80323
    os-freebsd, community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [NativeAOT] Objective-C exception propagation #80334
    community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Update our inline observations to special case a few more intrinsics #80637
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [JIT] X64/ARM64 - `CAST` removals for small types on `ADD`, `SUB`, `MUL`, `AND`, `OR`, `XOR`, `NOT`, `NEG` #77874
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [browser] make default initial memory size 16MB #80507
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, 8.0.0
  • Enable partial compilation of methods #80635
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [wasm] Run library tests with v8 --experimental-wasm-eh #80271
    arch-wasm, test-enhancement, area-Infrastructure-mono
  • allow to set custom serial speed on Linux #80534
    os-linux, area-System.IO.Ports
  • Vectorize Enumerable.Range(...).ToArray() #80633
    area-System.Linq, community-contribution
  • Optimizing a series of divisions (#74020) #74314
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, 8.0.0
  • [QUIC] Log msquic version and commit hash to event log and to test output. #80612
    area-System.Net.Quic
  • Changed handle table scanning so that we would scan all slots for any heap count we may have. #80541
    area-GC-coreclr
  • Add ability statically link OpenSSL #80380
    community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Strip all symbols on macOS as well #80515
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [mono][interp] Expand bblocks reordering with common patterns to facilitate propagation of values #80362
    area-Codegen-Interpreter-mono, 8.0.0
  • Use TaskDialog for error dialog in Windows GUI apps #78087
    area-Host
  • Implement DivRem intrinsic for X86 #66551
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, new-api-needs-documentation, 8.0.0
  • Refactoring store liveness update #80539
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Add type loader support for resolving static virtuals #80601
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Generate fewer templates for generic virtual methods #80600
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • SP800-108 CTR HMAC #79120
    area-System.Security, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Replace successive "ldr" and "str" instructions with "ldp" and "stp" #77540
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Add tests for exercising certificates with platform provider keys #80558
    area-System.Security
  • Implement new `ComWrappers` APIs #80402
    area-Interop-coreclr, new-api-needs-documentation, 8.0.0
  • Fix NET 7.0 streamed http response reading #80638
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, community-contribution
  • Add logger and tests for xml parsing in NativeAOT #80470
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr, 8.0.0
